name: Niu Solutions
description: Niu Solutions has been providing innovative and agile IT solutions to challenger businesses for decades. Our mission is to give our customers the ‘Freedom to Succeed’. In other words it is our job to ensure that the IT infrastructure we manage for our customers allows them to achieve their business goals. Nothing makes us happier than seeing our customers grow and prosper, and we believe that we have a key role in helping that happen through the services we provide.
